publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3080# Brian Adam: Future of the Paper Manufacturing Industry in Scotlandâ€”That the Parliament expresses concern at the recent closure announcements in respect of the BPB papermill at Mugiemoss, Aberdeen, and the threatened closure of the Corpach pulp mill in Fort William and the Carrongrove paper mill in Denny; notes the crisis in paper manufacturing and related industries in Scotland, and considers that the Scottish Executive should take action to halt the decline.

S2M-3080 #Future of the Paper Manufacturing Industry in Scotland (lodged on 1 July 2005) Dennis Canavan*, Alex Fergusson*, Robin Harper*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Alex Neil*, Stewart Stevenson*, Fergus Ewing*, Richard Lochhead*
S2M-3080 #Future of the Paper Manufacturing Industry in Scotland (lodged on 1 July 2005) Jim Mather*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Matheson*

S2M-3080# Future of the Paper Manufacturing Industry in Scotland (lodged on 1 July 2005) Mr David Davidson*, Christine Grahame*, Rob Gibson*, Mr John Swinney*, Ms Sandra White*, John Swinburne*
S2M-3080# Future of the Paper Manufacturing Industry in Scotland (lodged on 1 July 2005) Tricia Marwick*
